title: Screw Riot
body: I can't believe the gall these people have trying to give me free skins for behaving. I mean seriously, it's starting to piss me off how much money I don't have to spend because I'm getting so many cool rewards from just playing the game. I feel like you secretly want me to buy stuff and that's why you're giving me free stuff. That's it, it's a plot to ban my account for being toxic so I can make a new account and get more free stuff. God, this game is going downhill fast.
